Field Detail

constraints

protected int[][] constraints
Array representing the required constraints for applying this transition. Each row represents a set of constraints; there is one row for each annotation that needs to be matched. The elements of each row are:
Position Interpretation
0 annotation type
1 negated if value is negative
2..n predicates that need to be checked for this annotation
All constraints (predicates) that share the same annotation type refer to the same annotations, so all rows have distinct values on position 0. For the transition to be applied successfully, all constraints need to be satisfied.

nextState

protected int nextState
The target state of this transition.

type

protected int type
The type of this transition. This value copies TransitionPDA.getType().

SPTBase.Transition
